Instruction: Heat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper.

Beat the egg white in a large glass or metal mixing bowl until foamy. Gradually add sugar, beating until whites form stiff peaks. Fold in the toasted almonds. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets.
When the cookies are completely cool, you can transfer them to airtight containers or plastic bags and store in the freezer.
